name: ColorPicker.Root
description: A component that allows users to select a color from a color picker.
description_zh: A component that allows users to select a color from a color picker.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

closeOnSelect.description: Whether to close the color picker when a swatch is selected
closeOnSelect.description_zh: 是否在选择色板时关闭拾色器

defaultOpen.description: The initial open state of the color picker.
defaultOpen.description_zh: 颜色选取器的初始打开状态。

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the color picker when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the color picker.
defaultValue.description_zh:
颜色选取器首次呈现时的初始值。
在不需要控制颜色选取器的状态时使用。

disabled.description: Whether the color picker is disabled
disabled.description_zh: 颜色选取器是否处于禁用状态

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; control: string; trigger: string; label: string; input: string; hiddenInput: string; content: string; area: string; areaGradient: string; positioner: string; formatSelect: string; areaThumb: string; channelInput(id: string): string; channelSliderTrack(id: ColorChannel): string; channelSliderT...
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the color picker. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 颜色选取器中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

initialFocusEl.description: The initial focus element when the color picker is opened.
initialFocusEl.description_zh: 打开颜色选取器时的初始焦点元素。

invalid.description: Whether the color picker is invalid

modelValue.description: The v-model value of the color picker
modelValue.description_zh: 颜色选取器的 v-model 值

name.description: The name for the form input

open.description: Whether the color picker is open

openAutoFocus.description: Whether to auto focus the color picker when it is opened
openAutoFocus.description_zh: 是否在颜色选取器打开时自动聚焦它

positioning.description: The positioning options for the color picker
positioning.description_zh: 颜色选取器的定位选项

readOnly.description: Whether the color picker is read-only
readOnly.description_zh: 颜色选取器是否为只读

required.description: Whether the color picker is required

events.name: focusOutside
events.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component
events.description_zh: 当焦点移出组件时调用的函数

events.name: formatChange
events.description: Function called when the color format changes
events.description_zh: 颜色格式更改时调用的函数

events.name: interactOutside
events.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component
events.description_zh: 当交互发生在组件外部时调用的函数

events.name: openChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the user opens or closes the color picker.
events.description_zh: 在用户打开或关闭颜色选取器时调用的处理程序。

events.name: pointerDownOutside
events.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the component
events.description_zh: 在组件外部按下指针时调用的函数

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the value changes, as the user drags.
events.description_zh: Handler，该值更改时，当用户拖动时调用。

events.name: valueChangeEnd
events.description: Handler that is called when the user stops dragging.
events.description_zh: 当用户停止拖动时调用的 Handler。
